full_summary:
forcement instruction
# Tender Notice for the Acquisition of a Portable Infrared Oven

## Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the National Research Council of Canada (NRC), is issuing a tender notice for the acquisition and delivery of a portable infrared oven for NRC located in Boucherville, Quebec, Canada. This tender notice offers a request for proposal (RFP).

## Key Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3744601933
* **Notice Publication Date**: November 25, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 22, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Boucherville, Quebec
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: National Research Council of Canada (NRC)

## Mandatory Requirements

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on or before the tender closing date. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

## Specifications

The portable infrared oven must be specifically designed for laboratory use. The tender notice describes the requirements in detail (see Annex A).

## Contact Information

For any inquiries regarding this tender notice, please contact:

Alina Cocieru, PSPC/SPAC
alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: Although the contact phone number and fax number are not provided, you can reach out to Ms. Cocieru via email for further clarification or information.

## Additional Information

You can find the tender notice and annexes at the following website: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14727617?extsite=MTQ3Mjc2MTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

Submission of bids after the tender closing date will be considered non-responsive. Please ensure that all required documentation is complete and submitted on time to be considered for this opportunity.
